thread.title: Temperatures to drop in Armenia from Sunday - Panorama | Armenian news
thread.title_full: Temperatures to drop in Armenia from Sunday - Panorama | Armenian news

author: Helix Consulting LLC
title: Temperatures to drop in Armenia from Sunday - Panorama | Armenian news
text: Temperatures to drop in Armenia from Sunday Clear weather is expected in Armenia on Friday, Saturday and later next week. Rain and snow are forecast for some parts of the country on Sunday and Monday. Temperatures are set to fall by up to 11C starting from Sunday. The capital Yerevan could see showers late on Sunday and Monday.
